WorkItem.Description:
Every file I create using PHPExcelWriterExcel5 is filled with some unwanted borders, only visible in the Print preview and not in normal mode. I haven't actually printed the file but I suppose the borders will still be there if I do so.
For example, this is the file 14excel5.xls from the Tests directory in print preview mode: 
http://img120.imageshack.us/my.php?image=screen1nu1.jpg
 
This is the same file, but generated by PHPExcelWriterExcel2007: (had to save and reopen because of the printing bug in excel)
http://img238.imageshack.us/my.php?image=screen2tf8.jpg
 
Any ideas?

Comments.Message: Disabling grid lines did the trick...
